name: Compendium of pointless games
description:
This compendium is of 3 games I made in a fortnight in my 2nd year of games design at RMIT.  They are just for fun, pointless and quickly made games. 

1. Themed 'Australia' - a walking sim set in australia with a couple of experiences we've all had while in the bush.

2. Themed 'Looking' - a weird maze with invisible colisions that mess up your controls

3. Themed 'Physics' - a survival arena type game where you punch away blocks flying at you

readme.txt with controls, and seperate asset.txt files included

Enjoy!
